value.name: Syracuse police shooting ruled justified
value.description: The Utah Attorney General's Office ruled Thursday 49-year-old Thomas Hamby shot first, and three officers from Syracuse and Davis County fired back to protect themselves. Hamby was flown to a ...

value.name: Syracuse police release body camera footage of shooting
value.description: SYRACUSE, Utah (AP ... sound of gunfire shortly after officers arrived at the home of 49-year-old Thomas Hamby. Prosecutors say the shooting was legally justified because Hamby fired first ...
